title: Denali National Park & Preserve: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar             Calendar       Check out events happening throughout the year in Denali!           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 20 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Denali National Park & Preserve Bug Day for Kids!      Time: 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM Location: Murie Science and Learning Center (Mile 1.2, Denali Park Road) Fees: Free     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Explore the microwilderness of Denali and help scientists discover bugs, beetles, bumble bees and other spineless creatures that roam the park.  View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Morning Walk with a Ranger      Time: 8:15 AM to 9:00 AM Location: Downtown Talkeetna Fees: Free     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Every Tuesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly  from 06/02/2016 to 09/01/2016 Meet Ranger Laura on Main and C Streets (Talkeetna Roadhouse) for a 45 minute stroll in the area. Please note, this program is in Talkeetna, Alaska, located about 2 hours south of the main park entrance.  View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Mountaineering Talk      Time: 1:00 PM to 2:00 AM Location: Talkeetna Museum Fees: $3 (museum admission fee)     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Everyday  from 06/01/2016 to 09/01/2016 Join a NPS Ranger for a 30-45 minute talk around a scale model of Denali. Please note that this program is in Talkeetna, Alaska, about 2 hours south of the main park entrance.  View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Mushrooms of Denali      Location: Varies Fees: Varies     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Join renowned mycologist Dr. Gary Laursen in Denali and learn various techniques for identifying native wild mushrooms during a multi-day field course. View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Ranger-led Activities      Location: Various locations Fees: free     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Everyday  from 05/20/2016 to 09/15/2016 Join a ranger for a hike, talk or sled dog demonstration.  View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Shuttle and Tour Bus Service in Denali      Location: Denali National Park and Preserve Fees: prices vary     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Everyday  from 05/20/2016 to 09/15/2016 6 million acres, just one road! See the wilderness of the park via one of a variety of narrated tour or non-narrated shuttle bus trips. Main season is June - September, though you'll still find options in late May and early September. View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Sled Dog Demonstration      Location: Sled Dog Kennels (Mile 3.1, Denali Park Road) Fees: Free     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Everyday  from 05/15/2016 to 09/20/2016 Denali's most popular program is a demonstration in the park sled dog kennels. Learn about the history of the park dogs and watch a ranger ride a sled pulled by a small dog team.  View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Family Hike on the Horseshoe Lake Trail      Time: 9:30 AM Location: Denali Visitor Center Fees: Free     Friday, August 12, 2016 Join rangers for a hike on Horseshoe Lake Trail for the whole family. Participants meet at the entrance to the Denali Visitor Center at 9:30 am and will take the free Riley Creek Shuttle near to the trail head. The hike will begin around 10 am. View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Summer Speaker Series      Time: 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM Location: Murie Science and Learning Center (Mile 1.4, Denali Park Road) Fees: free     Friday, August 12, 2016 Join our Alaska Geographic host for a presentation of the Summer Speaker Series, occurring several evenings a week and featuring researchers and other experts from various fields.  View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Evening NPS Centennial Celebration in Talkeetna, Alaska      Time: 7:00 PM Location: Sheldon Community Arts Hangar, Talkeetna, Alaska Fees: Free     Saturday, August 13, 2016 This is the Alaskan premier of Voyagers Without Trace and an event not to miss! The film has received multiple distinguished awards, including those from the Wild and Scenic Film Festival and the Banff Mountain Film Festival.  View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Evening Ranger Talk      Time: 8:00 PM to 8:45 PM Location: Talkeetna Alaskan Lodge Fees: Free     Saturday, August 13, 2016 Every Wednesday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/01/2016 to 08/31/2016 Join a Ranger for a talk on a variety of topics using images and props. Please note, this program is in Talkeetna, Alaska, about 2 hours south of the main park entrance. View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Guided Hike in American Sign Language      Time: 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Denali Visitor Center Fees: Free     Saturday, August 13, 2016 Join a ranger-led hike interpreted in American Sign Language (ASL) by a Volunteer-in-Park. The trail is 3.4 miles long and gains about 400 feet in elevation.  View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve NPS Centennial Celebration in Talkeetna, Alaska      Time: 12:30 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Walter Harper Talkeetna Ranger Station, Talkeetna, Alaska Fees: Free     Saturday, August 13, 2016 Come celebrate 100 Years of the National Park Service in Talkeetna with staff from Denali National Park and Preserve. These activities will begin at the Walter Harper Talkeetna Ranger Station.  View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Pygmy Tundra Buffalo Run      Location: Denali Park Road Fees: $25 - $30 per person     Saturday, August 13, 2016 The non-profit Denali Education Center is teaming up with sponsor Holland America Princess to host the 2016 Pygmy Tundra Buffalo Run, an annual half marathon, 5k run, or 1.5 mile fun run. View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Guided Hike of Triple Lakes Trail      Time: 9:30 AM Location: Start at the Denali Visitor Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Rangers will be leading a through-hike of Triple Lakes Trail on Sunday, August 14. Participants meet at the entrance to the Denali Visitor Center at 9:30 am and will transport to the trail head. Participation is limited! Please sign up in advance.  View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Third-Monday Movie: Inspiring Park Connections      Time: 7:00 PM Location: Denali Visitor Center (Mile 1.5, Denali Park Road) Fees: Free     Monday, August 15, 2016 Every third Monday of the month this season, we will offer a free screening of a film linking Denali to other amazing National Parks. View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Denali Education Center Auction      Location: Denali Education Center Fees: TBD     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Join one of the park's non-profit partners, the Denali Education Center, at their annual fund-raising auction.  View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Living Legacies: Hiking in the Footsteps of Denali's Conservation Icons      Location: Varies Fees: Varies     Wednesday, August 24, 2016  Celebrate the National Park Service’s 100th birthday by retracing the steps of some of Denali’s most influential conservationists with an Alaska Geographic educator. This is a multi-day field course. View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Celebrate Founder's Day!      Location: Riley Creek Day Use Area Fees: free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Celebrate THE day that the Organic Act was signed. This Act created the National Park Service 100 years ago.  View Details      Denali National Park & Preserve Autumn Odyssey      Location: Varies Fees: Varies     Wednesday, August 31, 2016 Join long time Denali resident and naturalist Nan Eagleson to uncover an intriguing web of stories taking place during the short autumn season on this multi-day field course. View Details
